search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Jira Software Cloud (jira-software-cloud.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Jira Software Cloud is: https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/pricing

**Simple, transparent pricing for every team.**
===============================================

![Image 1](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/7bbpt3xbm8bk3nhss8kmp2c/heading-squiggle.svg)

Team size:

users

Bill me:MonthlyAnnuallySAVE UP TO 17%

Free
----

Free forever for 10 users

$0

[Get it now](https://www.atlassian.com/try/cloud/signup?bundle=jira-software&edition=free)

### Includes:

*   Unlimited goals, projects, tasks, and forms
    
    Align projects and tasks to goals. Collect data with forms.
    
*   Backlog, list, board, timeline, calendar, and summary views
    
    Choose from different views to support your way of working.
    
*   Reports and dashboards
    
    Get insights on teamwork tracked in any Jira product or project.
    
*   100 automation rule runs per month
    
    Increase efficiency by replacing manual, time-consuming work with automated processes and workflows.
    
*   2 GB of storage
    
*   Support from Atlassian Community
    
    Find answers and support from other Atlassian users.
    
*   Up to 10 users
    

Standard
--------

Everything you need to get started

$7.53per user / month

[Start free trial](https://www.atlassian.com/try/cloud/signup?bundle=jira-software&edition=standard)

### Everything from Free, plus:

*   User roles and permissions
    
    Control what users can create, view, and comment on in Jira.
    
*   External collaboration
    
    Give people outside your org anonymous access to Jira projects.
    
*   Multi-region data residency
    
    Specify where your content and data are hosted.
    
*   1,700 automation rule runs per month
    
    Increase efficiency by replacing manual, time-consuming work with automated processes and workflows.
    
*   250 GB of storage
    
*   9/5 regional support
    
    2-hr response time for critical issues from Cloud support team.
    
*   Up to 50,000 users on a single site
    

Recommended

Premium
-------

Align multiple teams

$13.53per user / month

[Start free trial](https://www.atlassian.com/try/cloud/signup?bundle=jira-software&edition=premium)

### Everything from Standard, plus:

*   Rovo Search, Chat, and Agents, and integrated AI-powered work features
    
    Unlock AI-powered teamwork with access to Rovo Search, Chat, and Rovo Agents. Streamline project management with integrated AI features that simplify setting up, tracking, and collaborating across work.
    
*   Cross-team planning and dependency management
    
    Plan and track goals, projects, and dependencies in one place.
    
*   Customizable approval processes
    
    Add approval steps to your workflows to get required signoffs.
    
*   Per user automation limits (1,000 rule runs per month)
    
    Increase efficiency by replacing manual, time-consuming work with automated processes and workflows.
    
*   Unlimited storage
    
*   24/7 support for critical issues
    
    1-hr response time for critical issues from Cloud support team.
    
*   99.9% uptime SLA
    

Enterprise
----------

Advanced analytics, scale and security for enterprises

Billed annually.Switch to Annual billing above to view Enterprise pricing.

[Contact sales](https://www.atlassian.com/enterprise/contact?formType=pricing-quotes)

### Everything from Premium, plus:

*   Cross-product insights with Atlassian Analytics and Data Lake
    
    Aggregate data from across your Atlassian toolchain for holistic insights that drive better decision making.
    
*   Advanced admin controls and security
    
    Manage users and security at scale with advanced governance controls like advanced encryption and Shadow IT controls.
    
*   Enterprise-grade identity and access management
    
    Get support for multiple identity providers (IdPs) within your central admin console, plus SCIM, enforce SSO, and more with [Atlassian Guard Standard](https://www.atlassian.com/software/guard) included.
    
*   Unlimited automation rule runs
    
    Increase efficiency by replacing manual, time-consuming work with automated processes and workflows.
    
*   Multiple sites (up to 150)
    
    Enable data isolation and administrative autonomy. Customize each instance to the needs of the teams who use it.
    
*   24/7 support for all issues
    
    30-min response time for critical issues with dedicated phone number and senior support team.
    
*   99.95% uptime SLA

----------------

[Learn about features](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/features)

Unlimited Issues

In Jira, teams use issues to track individual pieces of work that must be completed. Depending on how your team uses Jira, an issue could represent a project task, a helpdesk ticket, a leave request form, etc.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/issues/overview#what-is-an-issue) about issues.

Customizable workflows

Every team has their own style for moving work from ‘to do’ to ‘done.’ Create a custom workflow that helps your team work as efficiently as possible.

Project templates

Choose from a wide selection of project templates based on your team function or use case. Templates include pre-configured issue types, workflows, and other relevant features to help teams get started quickly.

Explore the [Jira template library](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/templates).









 | Free

Backlog view

The backlog is a type of to-do list for your Jira project. Backlogs are dedicated spaces for keeping track of tasks that you want to do in the future.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-software-cloud/docs/enable-the-backlog/) about backlog view.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

List view

List view combines the intuitive nature of spreadsheets with the power of Jira. Add, update, sort, filter, group, and rank items with blazing speed using inline editing.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-work-management/docs/what-is-the-list-view/) about list view.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

Board view

Board view helps you track work all the way to completion through your team’s custom workflow. See assignees, statuses, and due dates at a glance.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-software-cloud/docs/what-is-a-jira-software-board/) about board view.









 | Free

Timeline view

Timeline view allows you to plan work, track progress, and map dependencies at a granular level within a single team or project.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-software-cloud/docs/enable-and-disable-the-timeline/) about timeline view.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

Calendar view

Calendar view allows you to manage tasks across schedules to meet your deadlines. You can also see the duration of calendar items from start date to end date.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-work-management/docs/what-is-the-calendar-view/) about calendar view.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

Summary view

Summary view gives you an overall snapshot of your team’s work, including status overviews, workloads, and more.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-work-management/docs/get-a-summary-of-your-project/) about summary view.









 | Free

Dashboards

Dashboards visualize data from across any Jira product and project in a single place. Choose from dozens of pre-configured options or build your own custom dashboard.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/reports-dashboards/overview#what-is-a-system-dashboard) about dashboards.

Reports and team insights

Access out-of-the-box reports with real-time, actionable insights on how your team is performing over time.

Bring reports into a dashboard to have all your data in a single view for fast, informed decision-making.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/features/reports) about reporting in Jira.

Apps and integrations

Seamlessly connect Jira to the tools you use. Improve your team's workflow with thousands of integrations, apps, and more with any integration that works for Jira Cloud.

User limit per site

This is the maximum number of users or user licenses you can add to each Jira site.









 | Free

10 users

50,000 users

50,000 users

50,000 users

 |
| 

Number of sites

This is the number of sites (also called “instances”) you can license based on the subscription plan you choose. One site is typically enough for most small to medium organizations.

Enterprise subscribers often opt for multiple sites, up to 150 per product, to:

*   Offer organizational autonomy to independent brands
    
*   Improve security through separating data by region or department
    
*   Customize instances based on Marketplace apps, project configurations, and more
    

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/organization-administration/docs/how-many-instances-of-a-product-does-my-organization-need/) about instances in Jira.









 | Free

1 site

 | Standard

1 site

 | Premium

1 site

 | Enterprise

Up to 150

 |
| 

Storage

Products in the Jira suite and Confluence all come with their own file storage space.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/security-and-access-policies/docs/track-storage-and-move-data-across-products/) about storage.









 | Free

2 GB file storage

 | Standard

250 GB file storage

Unlimited file storage

Unlimited file storage

Email notifications

Our Free plan for Jira lets you send a maximum of 100 email notifications each day. After 100 emails, your notifications will be paused until the following day. Upgrade to a paid plan to send unlimited email notifications.









 | Free

100 emails per day

 | Standard

Unlimited

 | Premium

Unlimited

Unlimited

| 

User roles and permissions

Assign roles to different users, like administrator or end-user. In the Free plan, every user is a project admin. Different permissions apply to users depending on their role.

Set permissions to control which users can create new projects and what users can do, see, and comment on within a project or issue. Permission settings for projects or issues are only available on paid plans.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/permissions/overview#what-are-permissions-and-permission-schemes) about users and permissions.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Anonymous access

Anonymous access lets people outside of your organization view and create issues without logging in. Allow external partners to see work in progress on joint projects or give customers the ability to submit bugs and feature requests.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-cloud-administration/docs/allow-anonymous-access-to-projects/) about anonymous access.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| Simplify cross-functional work |  |  |  |  |
| 

Advanced planning (Plans)

Plans allow you to plan and track work across multiple teams and projects. Designed for cross-functional visibility and collaboration, advanced planning brings people, work, and goals into a shared space where deliverables are balanced against capacity, dependencies are flagged early on, and real-time updates are readily available to stakeholders.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/advanced-roadmaps/overview#what-is-advanced-planning) about advanced planning.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Dependency management

Dependencies show the relationship between issues in a project or plan. Dependencies within a single team or project can be visualized in the timeline view of a project.

Dependencies across multiple teams and projects can be visualized in a plan using the pre-configured dependency management view or Dependencies tab.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/advanced-roadmaps/overview#how-do-i-manage-dependencies) about dependency management.









 | Free

Single Project

 | Standard

Single Project

 | Premium

Cross-project

 | Enterprise

Cross-project

 |
| 

Capacity management

Capacity management is available to teams scheduling work within a plan. Assign work based on capacity and timeframe to create a realistic plan for your teams and set the right expectations with stakeholders.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/advanced-roadmaps/overview#how-do-i-manage-team-capacity) about capacity management.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Expandable Issue Hierarchy

In Jira, issue hierarchy levels show the relationship between issue types, from big units of work to small. Expandable issue hierarchy allows you to custom create additional issue levels to visualize everything from quarterly goals down to daily tasks within a plan.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/advanced-roadmaps/overview#how-do-i-customize-issue-hierarchy) about issue hierarchy.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Scenario Modeling

Scenarios allow you to explore alternative paths for your plan, such as best case and worst case. This allows you to quickly assess the downstream impact and tradeoffs before committing to changes.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/guides/advanced-roadmaps/overview#how-do-i-plan-for-different-scenarios) about scenarios.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Approvals

Add approval steps to your workflows to ensure that reviewers sign off on tasks before they’re advanced to the next stage.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-work-management/docs/what-are-approvals/) about approvals.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| Scale on the Atlassian platform |  |  |  |  |
| 

Atlassian RovoNew

Unlock AI-powered teamwork with access to Rovo Search, Chat, and specialized Agents and streamline how you plan, track, and deliver your best work. [Learn more.](https://www.atlassian.com/software/rovo)









 | Free

Know who you’re working with and what they're working on.

| 

Automation

Automate any task or process in a few clicks. Set automation rules within a single project, across multiple projects or across all projects on your site to help you scale. Save time and keep your team focused with Jira’s no-code automation engine.

Free plan comes with 100 rule runs per month while Standard plan has 1700. Premium has 1000 rule runs per paid user per month. For example, 200 users on Premium plan would have 200,000 rules per month for Jira pooled across users.

The Enterprise plan allows unlimited rule runs on Jira.

You only pay for what you use - only automations that successfully perform an action count towards your limit.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/features/automation) about automation.









 | Free

100 rule runs per month

1,700 rule runs per month

Build interactive, customizable charts, and dashboards across products and instances with a low- to no-code editor.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/platform/analytics) about Atlassian Analytics.

Access fully modeled data across your Atlassian tools in one place.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/platform/analytics) about Atlassian Data Lake.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/platform/analytics) about data connectors.

Domain verification lets an organization admin centrally manage all of the Atlassian accounts that use the company's domain.

Session duration management (desktop)

Session duration management allows an organization admin to set a session timeout value different from the default policy of 30 days. This means admins can control how long a team member can stay signed in without interacting with [Atlassian.com](https://www.atlassian.com/).

Sandbox

Prepare, test, and experiment with products and apps before making changes to your production environment.

The sandbox gives you a realistic understanding of what your new feature might look like or how it works when released for your users.









 | Free

 | Standard

Release tracks

Control when and how you release changes to users with release tracks.

With options to control Atlassian cloud releases, release tracks make your daily management of our cloud products more predictable. This helps you plan, prepare, and ensure success for upcoming product changes.









 | Free

 | Standard

Project archiving

Archive projects and their associated issues when they’re no longer active to keep projects tidy, helping ensure everyone on your team has the most updated information.

User counts

User counts gives Atlassian admins visibility into how many users they are able to add to an Enterprise product; and conversely, user counts indicate if a product is at-or-near capacity.

Password policies

Password policies help ensure best practices for user-created passwords in Atlassian cloud products. This helps reduce the risk of security breaches.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Encryption in transit and at rest

All customer data stored within Atlassian cloud products and services is encrypted in transit over public networks using Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2+ with Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS) to protect it from unauthorized disclosure or modification.

Data drives on servers holding customer data and attachments in Jira Software Cloud, Jira Service Management Cloud, Jira Work Management Cloud, Confluence Cloud, Statuspage, Opsgenie, and Trello use full disk, industry-standard AES-256 encryption at rest.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |
| 

Business continuity and disaster recovery

Our Disaster Recovery Program consists of a few key practices to ensure the appropriate levels of governance, oversight, and testing.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/trust/security/security-practices#security-in-day-to-day-operations) about security practices.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

 |

MDM (Mobile Device Management)

Enforce security controls on mobile app usage through built-in mobile device management (MDM) support for iOS and Android.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/security-and-access-policies/docs/mobile-device-management-mdm-for-atlassian-mobile-apps/) about MDM.

 | Standard

 | Enterprise

Audit logs let administrators look at changes made to your site. This is useful when you need to troubleshoot a problem or keep a record of important events, like changes to global permissions.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Premium

 | Enterprise

Data residency

Specify where you want your data hosted in Atlassian's global cloud footprint. This can help meet your corporate policies and compliance requirements.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/security-and-access-policies/docs/understand-data-residency/) about data residency.









 | Free

 | Standard

 | Enterprise

Issue-level security

Safe for every type of sensitive work, lock down issues so only specific users or user groups can see and edit information.

[Learn more](https://support.atlassian.com/jira-cloud-administration/docs/configure-issue-security-schemes/) about issue-level security.









 | Free

 | Standard

#### Safeguard your mission-critical data

Add Atlassian Guard for enhanced security and visibility across your Atlassian cloud products. Set proactive security policies, quickly detect suspicious behavior, and take action with suggested remediation steps to protect your most valuable work. Additionally, with a Cloud Enterprise plan, you get support for multiple identity providers (IdPs) and Atlassian Guard Standard.

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/software/guard)

![Image 3](https://wac-cdn.atlassian.com/misc-assets/webp-images/Illo_DataCenter.svg)

Data Center Products
--------------------

Data Center is our self-managed product offering for customers with strict regulatory or security requirements. To learn more about this offering, please contact us.

[Contact Us](https://www.atlassian.com/enterprise/contact?formType=product-features)

[Learn more](https://www.atlassian.com/enterprise/data-center)

![Image 4: Quotation left](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/as/nckxxjgj9pkj5k78m5q48vh/object_speech_bubble_1?auto=webp&format=png?auto=webp)

Get more details
----------------

### How to calculate your subscription cost

Use our [pricing calculator](https://atlassian.com/software/jira/pricing#) at the top of this page to determine the price of your subscription. Simply enter how many users you have and choose a billing cycle (annual or monthly).

Our detailed cloud pricing tables include price ranges for our [Standard](https://atlassian.com/licensing/jira-software#what-does-a-jira-software-cloud-standard-subscription-cost) or [Premium](https://atlassian.com/licensing/jira-software#what-does-a-jira-software-cloud-premium-subscription-cost) plans on our purchasing and licensing site. [Contact our sales team](https://www.atlassian.com/enterprise/contact?formType=pricing-quotes) for Enterprise pricing, available only for annual subscriptions.

### About users & how you’re billed for them

A **user** is someone who can log in to one of your Jira sites and who exists in User Management. You can add and remove users as your team changes.

For **monthly** subscriptions, we’ll charge you for the following month’s subscription based on the exact number of Jira users you have.

For **annual** subscriptions, we’ll charge you for the tier that most closely matches your user count. Depending on the number of users purchased, annual subscriptions may be a better value.

See monthly and annual tiers for our [Standard](https://atlassian.com/licensing/jira-software#what-does-a-jira-software-cloud-standard-subscription-cost) or [Premium](https://atlassian.com/licensing/jira-software#what-does-a-jira-software-cloud-premium-subscription-cost) plan.

### Payment options

You can pay **monthly subscriptions** by credit card (MasterCard, Visa, or American Express) or PayPal.

For **annual subscriptions**, you can pay by credit card, bank transfer, or check.

### Free trial period, refunds, & subscription plan details

Our **Free plan** lets you try Jira for up to 10 users with 2GB of storage and Community Support.

If you'd like to add more than 10 users or get access to more support and storage, you can sign up for a 7-day free trial of our Standard or Premium plan. If you’re on the Free plan and exceed the user limit, we’ll automatically upgrade you to a 7-day free trial of the Standard plan.

Cancel any time, no payment information required.

If you're **unsatisfied** with any Atlassian Cloud product or service, we offer a refund. Monthly subscriptions are eligible for a refund within your first paid month and after your trial period ends. Annual subscriptions are eligible within 30 days of payment. [See how](https://www.atlassian.com/licensing/cloud#what-is-atlassian-refund-policy) to request a refund.

### Annual subscriptions

We offer annual subscriptions for Jira. For these subscriptions, we’ll bill you for the tier most closely matching your user count. Depending on the number of users purchased, annual subscriptions may be a better value.

Use our [pricing calculator](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/pricing#) at the top of this page to determine the price of your subscription. Simply enter how many users you have and choose the annual billing cycle.

### Cloud and self-managed options

**Important notice:** We’ve ended sales for new server licenses and will end support for server on Feb 15, 2024, PT. We’re continuing investment in Data Center with several key improvements. [Learn what this means for you.](https://atlassian.com/migration/assess/journey-to-cloud)

Our **cloud** products provide a complete SaaS solution, ready-made for all Atlassian customers. With cloud, we do the heavy lifting for you by providing built-in platform security and compliance, quick and simple set up, and financially backed SLAs for uptime and performance. Cloud comes with the added benefit of continuous innovation so your end-users will always have the latest and greatest features and functionality.

Our **Data Center (or, “self-managed”)** products enable you the flexibility to deploy on an infrastructure of your choice. You’ll have control over data management, security and compliance, when you upgrade, and how you manage uptime and performance.

[Learn more about the differences](https://atlassian.com/migration/assess/compare-cloud-data-center), or [take our assessment](https://atlassian.com/migration/assess/migration-assessment) to see which option best meets your organization’s needs.

### Jira Premium and Jira Enterprise

[Jira Premium](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/premium) enables teams of teams to grow confidently and collaborate seamlessly with features like advanced planning for cross-functional work, Atlassian Intelligence to boost productivity, global automation to standardize best practices, and unlimited storage to capture it all on a shared platform.

[Jira Enterprise](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/enterprise) is designed to meet the needs of large, complex organizations through multiple instances, centralized billing and administration, unlimited automation, and advanced insights with Atlassian Analytics. The enterprise plan protects an organization's most critical work with advanced security and identity capabilities, like the inclusion of Atlassian Access, as well as exclusive features like BYOK encryption and Product Requests to manage shadow IT.

![Image 5: Quotation right](https://wac-cdn-bfldr.atlassian.com/K3MHR9G8/at/vnxrbnhb59wvckf5wx3bx95/symbol_speech_bubble_3.svg?auto=webp&format=png?auto=webp)

### Questions?

We have answers. Read our full list of common questions and answers for specific Jira pricing and licensing.

[See price and licensing page](https://www.atlassian.com/licensing/jira#jira-cloud)

Manage Preferences
------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://www.atlassian.com/legal/cookies)

Accept all

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Targeting Cookies

Always Active

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Functional Cookies

Always Active

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

Always Active

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
